oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Phineas Newborn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: jazz; music; Newborn, Phineas, Jr.; 1980s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "To Play To Shows at Fantasia" -- From the accompanying article, "Phineas Newborn Jr. pointed to the thumb of his right hadn which was injured in a mugging near his Memphis home eight years ago. He moved the fingers and the thumb around slowly, complaining that the pain still bothered his a little. He suspects it will always bother him..."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nave, Mark
